thread.title: 10 Suspects, Including 70-Year-Old Woman, Officially Charged in Kim Kardashian Robbery
thread.title_full: 10 Suspects, Including 70-Year-Old Woman, Officially Charged in Kim Kardashian Robbery

author: Elisa Osegueda
title: 10 Suspects, Including 70-Year-Old Woman, Officially Charged in Kim Kardashian Robbery
text: 10 Suspects, Including 70-Year-Old Woman, Officially Charged in Kim Kardashian Robbery by Elisa Osegueda 2:10   Five men and one 70-year-old woman have been placed under formal investigation by Paris authorities in connection to Kim Kardashian West's Oct. 3 robbery , according to CBS News. On Friday, sources close to the prosecution team revealed to CBS' Elaine Cobbe that five men will face charges of armed robbery in an organized gang, kidnapping and holding Kardashian against her will, and criminal association. WATCH: Four Suspects Officially Charged in Kim Kardashian Paris Robbery Aomar A., 61, is identified by French media as being the mastermind behind the robbery. He was indicted on charges of weapons acquisition and possession, use of false identity, and possession of false documents. The four other men who have been charged are 61-year-old Didier D., who was indicted on charges of weapons acquisition and possession; 54-year-old François D., indicted on charges of possession of false administrative documents and 29-year-old Harminy A. and 72-year-old Pierre B., with charges for those two men yet to be revealed. The elderly woman, identified as Christiane G., was indicted on charges of being an accomplice to an armed robbery by an organized gang, accomplice to holding someone against their will, possession of category A or B weapons, and criminal association. The news comes one day after authorities confirmed that four people were indicted in connection to the Paris robbery, bringing the grand total to 10. All suspects are currently in custody, except for one individual, who is out on bail, Cobbe said. Kim was robbed at gunpoint in the luxury apartment she was staying in, while her former bodyguard , Pascal Duvier, accompanied her sister, Kourtney Kardashian, to a party. The robbers took cash and jewelry -- about 10 pieces worth an estimated $11.2 million total , including Kim's rare $4.5 million 20-carat Lorraine Schwartz diamond engagement ring from husband Kanye West. "It makes me so upset to think about it," Kim told her sisters Kourtney and Khloe about the incident during a preview of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, in which she broke her silence on the traumatizing robbery. WATCH: Kim Kardashian Makes First Official Public Appearance Since Paris Robbery in Dubai "They're going to shoot me in the back," she recalled, wiping away tears. "There's no way out." Kim is slowly making her way back into the spotlight. On Friday, the mother of two was the star guest at her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic’s master class in Dubai, marking her first public appearance since October. Watch below:
